headline: NRG Energy and Sunrun Partner to Expand Distributed Energy in Texas
summary: NRG teams up with Sunrun to link Texas home batteries to the grid to form a large virtual power plant (VPP).

raw.headline: NRG Energy and Sunrun Partner to Expand Distributed Energy in Texas
